title: Katie Price’s ex says he wouldn't 'brag to mates about 1/10 lazy sex'
text:
Katie and Charles enjoyed a brief romance at the end of August 2019 (Picture: Instagram)

Katie Price’s ex-boyfriend Charles Drury has branded her a ‘one out of ten’ in bed and claimed there wasn’t ‘anything to brag about to my mates’.

He also alleged that the pair did ‘a few lines’ of cocaine before sex but he added: ‘I don’t think she’s choosing drugs over the kids. She’s a good mum, it doesn’t affect her family life, but it’s how she copes.’

Katie and Charles enjoyed a brief romance at the end of August 2019 following her split from fiance Kris Boyson, and now the Essex builder has spoken out about their fling, alleging that they had sex together within hours of meeting in person but that Katie was ‘lazy’.

The 22-year-old said that the pair met on Instagram and ‘clicked straight away and then day by day things got more serious’.

Advertisement

They finally met in person at a spa in the Cotswolds where they ‘had a few drinks to relax and then headed up to the hotel room where we had even more and that’s when things started to get intimate for the first time’.

‘For any lad, it’s like a dream come true, but it wasn’t anything to brag about to my mates,’ he said.

‘I thought it was going to be better than what I expected.

‘I was disappointed. The whole expectation of her being Katie Price – this glamour model – you’re thinking it’s going to be amazing but then it’s an anti-climax.’

‘I was disappointed,’ he said (Picture: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

He went on to give her a ‘one out of ten’ and said she was ‘a bit lazy, but then suddenly she would surprise you and jump on top’.

A spokesperson for Katie said: ‘There is no truth in the allegation that she is taking drugs every day and has made significant steps to being drug-free – there have been lapses in the past but they are just that, not a regular event.

‘Katie is still in recovery and making progress.’

Charles moved in with Katie within weeks but they later split amid claims that she had cheated on him, with her ex, Kris.

Speaking to The Sun, the builder said he felt ‘mugged off’ but added that ‘it was relief with the suspicions and gut feelings I had, at least I knew it was true’.

Advertisement

Advertisement

He claimed that Katie wanted to wait for confirming their romance in order to ‘get more money by building up the suspense to sell our story with a couples’ photoshoot’.

Charles alleged that he broke up with her on the phone and told her that he was ’22 but I’m not a f***ing idiot’.

Kris and Katie are now back on (Picture: Backgrid)

However, his comments come after pals of the 41-year-old reality star claimed that Charles was trying to leak information on her.

‘He went through her phone and stole from her. Katie’s gone to police as he’s threatening to leak information,’ the insiders said.

‘She feels betrayed and shocked – she had no choice but to get police involved. They are investigating.’

A representative for Charles denied the claims: ‘Charles has not stolen anything from Katie. He has also not had any contact from the police.’

Metro.co.uk has contacted reps for Katie for comment.
